text: David Muse (July 27, 1949 â€“ August 6, 2022) was an American musician. He was known for his musical career with Firefall, The Marshall Tucker Band, Pam Rose and Bertie Higgins. Muse was diagnosed with non-Hodgkin lymphoma in 2011.O'Kelley, Jeff, "Benefit for David Muse to be Held....", Creative Loafing, August 25, 2010 He died on August 6, 2022 from the disease at his home in Palm Harbor, Florida at the age of 73.Corey Irwin, "David Muse, Multi- Instrumentalist for Firefall, Dead at 73", UCR, August7, 2022.
